arts.sum: Liverpool will look to maintain their 100% start to their 25/26 Premier League campaign when they travel to face Burnley in a match where the Reds will be firm favourites to take all three points in this encounter. They will be looking to make it twelve points out of twelve when they face a Burnley team who have had a mixed start to life back in the Premier League .
